verses.text: \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*: “\w Even|strong="H3068"\w* if \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* ask \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, ‘Where \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w*?’ \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* tell \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Those|strong="H3318"\w* destined \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*; \w those|strong="H3318"\w* destined \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*;\f + \fr 15:2 \ft See Revelation 13:10.\f* \w those|strong="H3318"\w* destined \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3318"\w* destined \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*.’

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5203"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w back|strong="H5186"\w*. \w So|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w weary|strong="H3811"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w showing|strong="H5162"\w* \w compassion|strong="H5162"\w*.

Jeremiah’s Woe

Woe \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mother, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w borne|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w* \w and|strong="H7379"\w* \w conflict|strong="H7379"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w lent|strong="H5383"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w borrowed|strong="H5383"\w*, \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w curses|strong="H7043"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said: “\w Surely|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H6256"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H6869"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* purpose; \w surely|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H6256"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w intercede|strong="H6293"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* enemy \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*.

Can anyone \w smash|strong="H7489"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*— \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* from \w the|strong="H7489"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*—\w or|strong="H7489"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* enslave \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* enemies \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \f + \fr 15:14 \ft Some Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, and Syriac (see also Jeremiah 17:4); most Hebrew manuscripts Then I will cause your enemies to bring you into a land\f* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w anger|strong="H5674"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w kindle|strong="H6919"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w burn|strong="H3344"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w attend|strong="H6485"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Avenge|strong="H5358"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w persecutors|strong="H7291"\w*. \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* patience, \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*. \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w endure|strong="H5375"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w honor|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* ate \w them|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*’s \w delight|strong="H8057"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* bear \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* band \w of|strong="H3027"\w* revelers, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w celebrate|strong="H7832"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* alone, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w pain|strong="H3511"\w* unending, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w wound|strong="H4347"\w* incurable, \w refusing|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*? \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3808"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mirage \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*— \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w*. The LORD’s Promise

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*; \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w speak|strong="H6310"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w noble|strong="H3368"\w* \w instead|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w worthless|strong="H3808"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w spokesman|strong="H6310"\w*. \w It|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.
